articles.author: Oliver Darcy, Chris Isidore
articles.title: Writers Guild and studios reach tentative deal, potentially ending a monthslong strike that ground Hollywood to a halt - CNN
articles.description: The major film and television studios and striking writers reached a tentative agreement on Sunday after days of marathon negotiating sessions, the Writers Guild of America said Sunday evening, paving a path forward to end the historic work stoppage that has …
